content:
According to the public prosecution of the prosecutors of the Happy District Prosecutor's Office of the Luhansk region, a local resident who entered the ranks of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the LNR, was found guilty of collaborative activity.

About thisinformsThe Prosecutor General's Office.

She was sentenced to 14 years in prison with confiscation of property. Also deprived of the right for 15 years to hold positions in law enforcement agencies.

Prosecutors in court proved that in the summer of 2022 the woman swore allegiance to the so -called "LNR" and voluntarily joined the ranks illegally created by the occupiers of the law enforcement agencies. She held a position in the Novoaydar Regional Ministry of Internal Affairs of the LNR. Took shape and firearms.

The convicted person patrols the territory of the captured Novoaydar, and also called on the local population to join the service.

The sentence was adopted in absentia. The convicted person will be sentenced from the moment of detention. She has now been wanted.
title: The resident of Luhansk region entered the ranks of the Ministry of Internal Affairs of the LNR. It was sentenced to 14 years in prison
description: About it reports the office of the Prosecutor General. She was punished - 14 years of deprivation ...
author: Army Inform
